dct_description_sm: drawn by J. Wyld ; Hewitt, Sc. Grafton Str. East, Totten. Ct. Ro.
Relief shown pictorially and by spot shading (for deserts).
Bar scale on map given in "British Statute Miles."
Shows topography, drainage, political boundaries, islands surrounding continent, and "regions unexplored."
Pictorial vignette: Sacrificing at the springs of the Nile.
Appears in Hewitt's A general atlas, containing maps illustrating some important periods in ancient history ... , Edinburgh: John Thomson & Co., 1825.
